CustomField.description: Field on product that should be adjusted. Valid options include 'Quantity', 'Unit_Price', 'List_Price', 'Discount', 'Start_Date', 'End_Date', 'Manually_Addible', 'Pricing_Set_Identifier', and 'Removable' for CPQ value adjustments. Alternatively, any QuoteLineItem field API name can be placed here and it will be saved to the product's QuoteLineItem record upon CPQ save.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field on product that should be adjusted. Valid options include 'Quantity', 'Unit_Price', 'List_Price', 'Discount', 'Start_Date', 'End_Date', 'Manually_Addible', 'Pricing_Set_Identifier', and 'Removable' for CPQ value adjustments. Alternatively, any QuoteLineItem field API name can be placed here and it will be saved to the product's QuoteLineItem record upon CPQ save.
CustomField.label: Product Adjustment Field
